name: Blume Babies: Travel Size Kit
about: What it is:A set with Blume's three bestsellers bundled together to fight acne, fade the appearance of hyperpigmentation, and hydrate skin..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Uneven Texture, and Acne and Blemishes.Highlighted Ingredients:- Ceramides: Support a strong skin barrier while protecting against water loss..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This glowy skin value set features travel sizes of Blumeâ€™s bestselling, calm skin essentials. Fight breakouts with Meltdown Acne Oil, fade the look of spots and scars with Milky Fade Serum, and hydrate for up to 72 hours with Meltdown Gel Cream..This Set Contains:- 0.34 oz/ 10 mL Meltdown Oil for Acne-Prone Skin (travel size)
ingredients: -Ceramides: Support a strong skin barrier while protecting against water loss. .-Niacinamide: Reduces the look of hyperpigmentation and visibly evens out texture. .-Vitamin C: An antioxidant for visibly brighter and more even skin tone...Meltdown Gel Cream for Acne-Prone Skin:.Water (Aqua), Propanediol, Squalane, Diisostearyl Malate, Diheptyl Succinate,Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Behenyl Alcohol, Maltol. reviews.review_title: A great way to test out Blume!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The minis are small, but large enough to get a good feel for the products, and I enjoyed all three items in the kit.  Milky Fade's lush, hydrating formula would be my top pick if I had to choose, but I get the hype surrounding the gel cream too -- its lightweight texture is a real standout and the cotton candy-esque scent is yummy without being sickly or over the top. The oil is a nice flexible formula too -- it works solo or mixed into the gel cream or another moisturizer, or just dotted on as a spot treatment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure what rating to give it because I just started using it today. I have really bad acne on my forehead and I had a few people tell me this works wonders but I hope it helps. Not a big fan of the way the oil smells but the gel cream reminds me of marshmallows.high hopes for these products
